attributes.action: Allow 2022 GCSE students to pick 2 science options.
attributes.additional_details: Allow students to choice the science options for GCSEs as students missed learning time in yr 9 and yr 10 and due to there being so many topics students cannot go over the topics again.
attributes.background: To allow students to have the choice due to lost learning time due to lockdowns and self isolations.Therefore students can choice 2 exams to sit out of chemistry biology and physics.
